NAME.Nominative: Thursday of the Great Canon of St Andrew
NAME.Short: Thursday of the Great Canon of St Andrew

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: O compassionate, long-suffering, almighty Lord, send down Thy mercy on Thy people.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.STICHOS: Let the many islands be glad.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O sing unto the Lord a new song, for the Lord hath wrought wondrous things
SEXTE.STICHOS: All the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
